doc:
Christina Hart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christina_Hart 0 Christina Hart (born July 21, 1949) is an American film producer, film director, playwright and retired actress. She teaches acting at the Hollywood Court Theater. Originally from Lock Haven, Pennsylvania, she has acted in films such as The Stewardesses (1969), The Mad Bomber (1973) and Charley Varrick (1973). She was married to actor Frank Doubleday; the couple have two daughters, Kaitlin and Portia, both also actresses. Christina_Hart ( born July_21_,_1949 ) is an_American_film_producer , film_director , playwright and retired_actress . She teaches_acting at the_Hollywood_Court_Theater . Originally from Lock_Haven , Pennsylvania , she has_acted in films such_as The_Stewardesses ( 1969_) , The_Mad_Bomber_(_1973_)_and_Charley_Varrick_(_1973_) . She was_married to actor_Frank_Doubleday ; the_couple have two_daughters , Kaitlin_and_Portia , both_also_actresses .
